```{r}
data = read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/datasets/covid-19/master/data/time-series-19-covid-combined.csv")
```

```{r}
colnames(data)
unique(data$Country.Region)
usdata = data[which(data$Country.Region == 'US'),]
```

```{r}
usadat_confirmed = read.csv("https://usafactsstatic.blob.core.windows.net/public/data/covid-19/covid_confirmed_usafacts.csv")
tndat_confirmed = usadat_confirmed[which(usadat_confirmed$State == 'TN'),]
```

```{r}
hamdat_confirmed = tndat_confirmed[which(tndat_confirmed$County.Name == 'Hamilton County'),]
dropcols = c("countyFIPS","County.Name","State","stateFIPS")
hamdat = hamdat_confirmed[,!(names(hamdat_confirmed) %in% dropcols)]
hamdat = as.data.frame(t(hamdat))
colnames(hamdat) = "Confirmed"
hamdat$Date = gsub('X', '',rownames(hamdat))
rownames(hamdat) = seq(1,length(hamdat$Confirmed))
hamdat$Cumulative = cumsum(as.numeric(hamdat$Confirmed))

hamdat= hamdat[which(hamdat$Date >= '3.1.20'),]
plot(hamdat$Cumulative, type="l")

plot(hamdat$Cumulative, type="l", ylim=c(0,(max(hamdat$Cumulative)+20)),col='#469990', lwd=4, ylab="Number of Confirmed Cases", xlab="", xlim=c(0,length(hamdat$Date)),main="Hamilton County Cases by Date", xaxt="n", yaxt="n",)
lines(hamdat$Confirmed, type="l",col='red', lwd=2)
axis(1, at= seq(1,length(hamdat$Date)), labels = hamdat$Date, las="2")
axis(2,las="2")
```
